price: Nibapfundika ingingo yo kwahukana naho, bakaguma ku ndahiro yabo y’ukutarangura amabanga y’abubatse muri nya kiringo, mu vy’ukuri Imana Allah Irumva ivyo bavuga, Irazi neza n’ivyo bazirikana, kandi Izobibahembera.
arabic: وَإِنۡ عَزَمُواْ ٱلطَّلَٰقَ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٞ

meta.transliteration: wa-in ʿazamū al-ṭalāqa fa-inna al-laha samīʿun ʿalīmun
